name: CarePlan.activity.detail.reasonCode
title: CarePlan.activity.detail.reasonCode
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.short: Why activity should be done or why activity was prohibited
element.definition: Provides the rationale that drove the inclusion of this particular activity as part of the plan or the reason why the activity was prohibited.
element.comment: This could be a diagnosis code.  If a full condition record exists or additional detail is needed, use reasonCondition instead.

binding.description: Identifies why a care plan activity is needed.  Can include any health condition codes as well as such concepts as "general wellness", prophylaxis, surgical preparation, etc.
